law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Innovative and alternative septic system" means any new, experimental, or nonconventional technology that is added to or used in place of a conventional septic or other on-site sewerage system.

text.section: "Program" means the Innovative and Alternative Septic System Grant Program.
